elementary Icons have a distinctive visu: Ikon elementary memiliki gaya visual yang berbeda yang terinspirasi dari Ikon Tango. Ikon pada elemenatary berbagi bersama beberapa elemen desain umum.
Icons should have a distinctive shape/si: Tiap ikon sebaiknya memiliki bentuk/siluet yang berbeda satu sama lain agar lebih mudah dikenali. Bentuknya jangan terlalu rumit, tetapi tidak harus selalu berbentuk segi empat tumpul.
All elementary Icons, and shapes within: Semua ikon dengan bentuk-bentuknya diberi lis tipis untuk memperkuat kontras. Pada resolusi rendah ketebalannya adalah 1px. Lis tersebut tidak boleh mengikuti skala ikon, jadi ketebalannya harus tetap 1px.
The color of the outline is a dark varia: The color of the outline is a dark variant of the key color of the icon. This is done by creating a stroke at 30% opacity of black such that the border of the background lines up at half pixels. This is what allows icons with a stroke to appear sharp on dark backgrounds as well as light ones.
The edges of objects tend to reflect lig: The edges of objects tend to reflect light more due to the fact the position of the observer relative to the light source is almost always ideal for the reflection. We produce a subtle second inner outline of the object as a highlight. This stroke is very subtle and may not be apparent on some matte objects.
Use glossy reflection only on objects th: Use glossy reflection only on objects that have a reflective surface in real life (plastic, glass, some metal, et cetera). A sheet of paper should not be glossy.
elementary Icons have a consistent light: elementary Icons have a consistent light source and perspective to keep a similar look throughout the system. The icons have been designed with the UI theme in mind, meaning everything shares a cohesive feel and a subtle amount of realism.
Icons are lit from above. Items may prod: Icons are lit from above. Items may produce a small, fuzzy shadow toward the bottom of the icon as if the icon is sitting on a shelf facing the user.
Icons should have the perspective of loo: Icons should have the perspective of looking at an object on a shelf at eye level. This means the icons are front-on, not from above and not tilted to the side. This also has an effect of giving icons slightly less depth than their real-world counterparts.
